headline: PRSA-NY Announces 2025 Individual Award Recipients and 15 Under 35 Honorees
summary: Top PR Leaders and Rising Stars to Be Celebrated at the Annual Big Apple Awards on September 18 at Sony Hall Barby K. Siegel, Global Chief Executive Officer, Zeno Group Winner of PRSA-NY's 2025 John W. Hill Award, which recognizes lifetime professional achievement in the practice of public relations. Doug Simon, CEO, D.S. Simon Media Winner of the PRSA-NY's Excellence in Mentoring Award, which honors individuals who continuously lead, guide and selflessly counsel the careers of communications pr

headline: 3 S&P 500 Stocks Walking a Fine Line
summary: The S&P 500 (^GSPC) is home to the biggest and most well-known companies in the market, making it a go-to index for investors seeking stability. But not all large-cap stocks are created equal - some are struggling with slowing growth, declining margins, or increased competition.

raw.headline: 3 S&P 500 Stocks Walking a Fine Line
